overview: Really vibrant kite flyers club india is 1 of leading international kite flyers group from india. they are providing lots kite related activity. like kite making, kite cutting competition, kite workshop, kite flying show, fun flying for family event, parties, brand promotion,and specially they are wellknown for led kite flying show. Such a nice kite flyers group and kite club ahmedabad.
